name: Relic Hunter (Z3SPY)
description:
===============================================================

This is my 4th game in itch.io, and sadly I was unable to finish my game.  I would consider my self a beginner in terms of skill, but other wise I have published other games.

===============================================================

GAME DESCRIPTION: 

Relic Hunter is a short platformer, with blink mechanics so that you can teleport to places that you need to go. The game's protagonist is a relic hunter with a bucket hat. The main character clumsily stumbles his way into a dungeon where he would find an ancient dagger, which lets him teleport to different locations depending on where the dagger is. Your goal is to find the exit and leave the dungeon so that you can enjoy some free time with your new dagger buddy.

Side Note: I accidentally switched the main menu with the ending screen. 

===============================================================

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Movement

Right Click - Retrieve Dagger

Left Click - Throw Dagger

E - Teleport To Dagger

R - Restart To Checkpoint
